name: Loaded CactDie - Beard and Bumblebee's first game.
name_original: Loaded CactDie - Beard and Bumblebee's first game.
description:
Be it through skill or simply a roll of the dice, survive as long as you can!

Dice System:

You will start with three dice. These are your HP. Each time you get hit you will lose a dice.  Dice will regenerate based on number of enemies killed. If you get hit on 0 dice, you're out.

You can trade any number of your dice for a chance at rolling for buffs at any time during the game. Once the dice have been rolled and cast, green dice will provide multipliers for player buffs, while red dice will buff the enemy.

Controls:

Use arrow keys/A, D and W to move the player.

Shoot using left mouse click.

Each press of  1 on your keyboard will trade a single dice for a roll (stackable up to 3 - careful...the enemy buffs stack as well!).  Press 2 to roll dice loaded into tray.
